title: Peer Coaching-Based Customized Professional Development Program for In-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Over 10 years of teaching experience, advanced proficiency in language pedagogy
context.additional_context: Provides personalized feedback through real classroom simulations in VR, interacting with peer teachers

learning_goals: Through peer coaching, establish and implement at least three specific instructional improvement plans.
Achieve at least 85% incorporation of peer feedback according to the VR simulation evaluation rubric.
Using learner engagement analysis tools, derive at least three data-driven improvements in lesson design.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
